com.diffplug.freshmark

Class CommentScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.freshmark.CommentScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parser.SectionCompiler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreshMark

    public abstract class CommentScript
extends Object
implements Parser.SectionCompiler
    A CommentScript is a way of automatically generating or modifying parts of a document by embedding scripts in the comments of that document.

    A CommentScript has the following form: 

     
 [COMMENT_START sectionName
 script
 script
 COMMENT_END]
 body
 body
 body
 [COMMENT_START /sectionName COMMENT_END]
    This class is a minimal implementation of a CommentScript. To create a CommentScript, you must provide:
    • A Parser to split the comment text from the body text.
    • keyToValue(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) - defines how template keys in the script string are transformed into values.
    • setupScriptEngine(java.lang.String) - initializes any functions or variables which should be available to the script.
    See Also:
    FreshMark

      protected CommentScript(Parser parser)
      Creates a CommentScript using the given parser to delineate and combine comment blocks.

      • compileSection

        public String compileSection(String section,
                             String script,
                             String input)
        Compiles a single section/script/input combo into the appropriate output.
        Specified by:
        compileSection in interface Parser.SectionCompiler

      • compile

        public String compile(String input)
        Compiles the given input string. Input must contain only unix newlines, output is guaranteed to be the same.

      • template

        protected String template(String section,
                          String script)
        Performs templating on the script before passing it to the ScriptEngine created by setupScriptEngine(java.lang.String).

        Defaults to mustache-based templating which uses keyToValue(String, String) to decode keys.

      • keyToValue

        protected abstract String keyToValue(String section,
                                     String script)
        For the given section, return the templated value for the given key.

      • setupScriptEngine

        protected abstract ScriptEngine setupScriptEngine(String section)
                                           throws ScriptException
        For the given section, setup any built-in functions and variables.

        The input value will be set for you, and the output value will be extracted for you, but you must do everything else.

        Throws:
        ScriptException
